email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. The laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quote. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer a revised rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 18.00 is more acceptable. Can we lock in the MV OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of 15-20 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Alex

[ATTACHMENTS: charter_party.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Sarah
